AND a.id = #{testId}
SELECT a.id AS "testId", a.title AS "questionTitle", a.type, a.select_num, a.file_path AS "questionFilePath" FROM hotel_ceshi_question a WHERE a.id IN (${testId})

SELECT DISTINCT a.id AS "noteId", a.question_id, a.standar_answer, a.user_answer, a.is_add_notes, b.file_path AS "questionFilePath", b.type AS "questionType", d.paper_type, e.question_score, c.status, c.paper_id, c.user_id AS "createUser", c.scorces_total AS "paperScore" FROM student_ceshi_detail a LEFT JOIN hotel_ceshi_question b ON a.question_id = b.id LEFT JOIN student_ceshi_paper c ON a.paper_id = c.paper_id AND a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN hotel_ceshi_paper d ON c.paper_id = d.paper_id LEFT JOIN hotel_ceshi_paper_questions e ON e.paper_id = a.paper_id AND e.question_id = a.question_id WHERE a.paper_id=#{paperId} AND a.user_id = #{createUser} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_ceshi_question( course_id, title, class, type, select_num, file_path, status, create_by, create_time ) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionClass}, #{type}, #{selectNum}, #{questionFilePath}, #{status}, #{createUser}, #{createTime} )
INSERT INTO hotel_ceshi_answers( question_id, answer_content, add_info, create_by, create_time ) VALUES( #{testId}, #{answerContent}, #{answerRemark}, #{createUser}, #{createTime} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hotel_ceshi_paper WHERE paper_id = #{paperId} AND create_by = #{createUser}
DELETE FROM student_ceshi_paper WHERE paper_id = #{paperId} AND user_id = #{createUser}
